attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We object to the manner in which Central Bedfordshire Council has carried out the Consultation on their proposal to abolish free transport to faith schools.
They have failed to comply with Government Code of Practice on Consultation in the following ways:-

a) Duration of Consultation should be at least 12 weeks - consultation length 6 weeks. 
b) Clarity of scope and impact - not made clear. 
c) Accessibility to Consultation - failed to imform relevant stakeholders of consultation.
d) Analysis of responses - timescale will preclude this. 
e) Consultation Document did not include the Government's criteria. 
Please support us in our fight for local democracy
